name: Frontend Scaffold Marketplace
description: A marketplace collection for frontend project scaffolds and templates
author: Claude Code

skills.name: frontend-scaffold
skills.description: Generate modern frontend projects with TypeScript, React, Vite, and Next.js templates
examples: Generate npm package: npm run use frontend-scaffold npm-package --name my-lib --description 'My awesome library' --author 'John Doe'
Generate React app: npm run use frontend-scaffold react-vite --name my-react-app
Generate Next.js app: npm run use frontend-scaffold nextjs-app-router --name my-nextjs-app

templates.name: npm-package
templates.description: Complete TypeScript library template with Rollup, Jest, and ESLint

templates.name: react-vite
templates.description: Modern React application with Vite, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Router

templates.name: nextjs-app-router
templates.description: Full-stack Next.js application with App Router and Tailwind CSS

development-tools.name: Development Tools
development-tools.description: Tools for project setup, scaffolding, code generation, and development automation

commands.use: Use a specific skill with arguments

quickStart.installation: Clone or download this marketplace repository
quickStart.setup: Run 'npm run install-skills' to install all skill dependencies
quickStart.usage: Use 'npm run list' to see available skills, then 'npm run use <skill>' to generate projects

contributing.guidelines: Add new skills in the skills/ directory following the established structure
contributing.testing: Each skill should include a test-generation.js script
contributing.documentation: Update SKILL.md and marketplace.json when adding new skills

1.0.0: Initial release of Frontend Scaffold Marketplace
Added frontend-scaffold skill with Node.js implementation
Three project templates: npm-package, react-vite, nextjs-app-router
